name: Create or Destroy: Battlegrounds
description:
Create or Destroy: Battlegrounds is a fast-paced shooter,  Made by UltimateGamer303 and DaRealSansYT. Originally starting out as a game we would pretend play with Nerf Guns at my house. But now, that changes.

DaRealSansYT: DaRealSansYT - YouTube
UltimateGamer303: UltimateGamer303 - YouTube
